title: The Weather Today
text: Today the weather is nice. The sun is shining and the sky is blue. It is warm outside. It is 25 degrees. I don't need a jacket. In winter, it is very cold here. It snows a lot. In summer, it is hot and sunny. I like summer best. On rainy days, I stay at home and read books. When it is cloudy, I feel a bit sad. But today is perfect for a walk in the park!
